CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function does not validate or sanitize the 'rows' input, which can lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) if the input includes malicious scripts. Also, the function does not properly escape or encode the output when creating HTML tags, which can also lead to XSS attacks if the 'opts.tag' or other 'opts' properties contain malicious scripts.
